metadata.title: CVE-2017-9430 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in dnstracer through 1.9 allows attackers tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact via a command line with a long name argument that ismishandled in a strcpy call for argv[0]. An example threat model is a webapplication that launches dnstracer with an untrusted name string.

criterions.comment: dnstracer package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
